AcPppEndDiscriminator.name: AcPppEndDiscriminator
AcPppEndDiscriminator.description: The EndPoint descriminator class provided to the remote PPP peer. For further information, refer to RFC-1990 for details.

acPppLinkStatusTable.name: acPppLinkStatusTable
acPppLinkStatusTable.description: A table containing PPP-link specific variables for this PPP implementation. This is an OSAP created Read Only record

acPppLinkStatusEntry.name: acPppLinkStatusEntry
acPppLinkStatusEntry.description: This record contains operational start up information about a particular PPP Link.

acPppLinkStatusNodeId.name: acPppLinkStatusNodeId
acPppLinkStatusNodeId.description: The node id is the id for this specific node in the OSAP ring.

acPppLinkStatusTimeSlotIndex.name: acPppLinkStatusTimeSlotIndex
acPppLinkStatusTimeSlotIndex.description: The value of acPppLinkStatusTimeSlotIndex is the same as acTimeSlotIndex in acTimeslotTable that this interface PPP link corresponds to.

acPppLinkStatusLocalMRU.name: acPppLinkStatusLocalMRU
acPppLinkStatusLocalMRU.description: The current value of the MRU for the local PPP Entity. This value is the MRU that the remote entity is using when sending packets to the local PPP entity. The value of this object is meaningful only when the link has reached the open state.

acPppLinkStatusRemoteMRU.name: acPppLinkStatusRemoteMRU
acPppLinkStatusRemoteMRU.description: The current value of the MRU for the remote PPP Entity. This value is the MRU that the local entity is using when sending packets to the remote PPP entity. The value of this object is meaningful only when the link has reached the open state.

acPppLinkStatusLocalToPeerACCMap.name: acPppLinkStatusLocalToPeerACCMap
acPppLinkStatusLocalToPeerACCMap.description: The current value of the ACC Map used for sending packets from the local PPP entity to the remote PPP entity. The value of this object is meaningful only when the link has reached the open state.

acPppLinkStatusPeerToLocalACCMap.name: acPppLinkStatusPeerToLocalACCMap
acPppLinkStatusPeerToLocalACCMap.description: The ACC Map used by the remote PPP entity when transmitting packets to the local PPP entity. The value of this object is meaningful only when the link has reached the open state.

acPppLinkStatusLocalToRemoteProtocolComp.name: acPppLinkStatusLocalToRemoteProtocolCompression
acPppLinkStatusLocalToRemoteProtocolComp.description: Indicates whether the local PPP entity will use Protocol Compression when transmitting packets to the remote PPP entity. The value of this object is meaningful only when the link has reached the open state.

acPppLinkStatusRemoteToLocalProtocolComp.name: acPppLinkStatusRemoteToLocalProtocolCompression
acPppLinkStatusRemoteToLocalProtocolComp.description: Indicates whether the remote PPP entity will use Protocol Compression when transmitting packets to the local PPP entity. The value of this object is meaningful only when the link has reached the open state.

acPppLinkStatusLocalToRemoteACCompressio.name: acPppLinkStatusLocalToRemoteACCompression
acPppLinkStatusLocalToRemoteACCompressio.description: Indicates whether the local PPP entity will use Address and Control Compression when transmitting packets to the remote PPP entity. The value of this object is meaningful only when the link has reached the open state.

acPppLinkStatusRemoteToLocalACCompressio.name: acPppLinkStatusRemoteToLocalACCompression
acPppLinkStatusRemoteToLocalACCompressio.description: Indicates whether the remote PPP entity will use Address and Control Compression when transmitting packets to the local PPP entity. The value of this object is meaningful only when the link has reached the open state.

acPppLinkStatusTransmitFcsSize.name: acPppLinkStatusTransmitFcsSize
acPppLinkStatusTransmitFcsSize.description: The size of the Frame Check Sequence (FCS) in bits that the local node will generate when sending packets to the remote node. The value of this object is meaningful only when the link has reached the open state.

acPppLinkStatusReceiveFcsSize.name: acPppLinkStatusReceiveFcsSize
acPppLinkStatusReceiveFcsSize.description: The size of the Frame Check Sequence (FCS) in bits that the remote node will generate when sending packets to the local node. The value of this object is meaningful only when the link has reached the open state.

acPppLinkStatusLocalMRRU.name: acPppLinkStatusLocalMRRU
acPppLinkStatusLocalMRRU.description: The current value of the MRRU for the local PPP Entity. This value is the MRRU that the remote entity is using when sending packets to the local PPP entity. The value of this object is meaningful only when the link has reached the open state.

acPppLinkStatusRemoteMRRU.name: acPppLinkStatusRemoteMRRU
acPppLinkStatusRemoteMRRU.description: The current value of the MRRU for the remote PPP link Entity. This value is the MRRU that the local entity is using when sending packets to the remote PPP link entity. The value of this object is meaningful only when the link has reached the open state.

acPppLinkStatusLocalEPDClass.name: acPppLinkStatusLocalEPDClass
acPppLinkStatusLocalEPDClass.description: The Endpoint Discriminator class provided to the remote PPP peer (See RFC-1990 for details).

acPppLinkStatusLocalEPDLength.name: acPppLinkStatusLocalEPDLength
acPppLinkStatusLocalEPDLength.description: The length of the Local Endpoint Discriminator, in bytes.

acPppLinkStatusLocalEPDArray.name: acPppLinkStatusLocalEPDArray
acPppLinkStatusLocalEPDArray.description: An ASCII representation of the contents of the Local Endpoint Discriminator.

acPppLinkStatusRemoteEPDClass.name: acPppLinkStatusRemoteEPDClass
acPppLinkStatusRemoteEPDClass.description: The Endpoint Discriminator class provided to the local PPP peer (See RFC-1990 for details).

acPppLinkStatusRemoteEPDLength.name: acPppLinkStatusRemoteEPDLength
acPppLinkStatusRemoteEPDLength.description: The length of the Remote Endpoint Discriminator, in bytes.

acPppLinkStatusRemoteEPDArray.name: acPppLinkStatusRemoteEPDArray
acPppLinkStatusRemoteEPDArray.description: An Ascii representation of the contents of the Remote Endpoint Discriminator.
